subject: Politics
title: The Iranian Revolution
description: Learn The Iranian Revolution in one minute.

hook.text: Iran had nightclubs and miniskirts in the 1970s. By 1979, an Islamic republic banned them all. Modernity reversed.

buildup.text: The Shah modernized Iran but repressed political opposition. His secret police tortured thousands.

discovery.text: Ayatollah Khomeini united Islamists, leftists, and liberals against the Shah. Then he seized total control.

twist.text: Liberals who helped the revolution were jailed or killed. The revolution betrayed most of those who made it.

climax.text: Iran's revolution reshaped the Middle East. It inspired Islamist movements and terrified secular Arab rulers.

punchline.text: Iran's revolution united against tyranny. It delivered a different kind.

quiz.question: What happened to the liberals who helped Iran's revolution?
options: They were jailed or killed after Khomeini consolidated power
They became the new government's leaders
